website_summaries.verdict: Great for storing large quantities of magazines. Ideal for an office space.
pros: Has five shelves for holding magazines
Lightweight and collapsible for easy transportation
cons: Not as sturdy as some of the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I love my Onyx Mesh Floor Rack. It is made very sturdy, and collapses so that I can take it everywhere I go. You can see it in the picture on the left hand side. I'm an Author and my books fit perfectly. Author Jim Maher and I book signed together and I even let him put some of his books in my Floor Rack!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perect, Super Easy Assembly, Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I got this for my mother's magazine and book collection, in the nursing home where she lives. Before this she was keeping everything cluttered, due to having no choice. Now she has her own cute little reading corner. I'm actually going to get her second one. Attaching a photo. This holds at least 5 magazines per container. Really great!. Very sturdy and super easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice family mail sorter or at-a-glance file stand.
customer_reviews.text: We needed mailboxes for each family member. This is great. File folders and school pocket folders fit horizontally. Each basket can hold 10-12 files or school folders. One of the metal baskets had a small dent which wasn't noticeable until I felt it with my hand. I wish it came in white to blend in with our neutral décor. I might spray paint it.
customer_reviews.author: RuthB

customer_reviews.title: For my piano books.
customer_reviews.text: I keep this next to our piano to store to books me and my daughter are currently working on. Before this, I had a pile of book on top of the piano. Good product for the money. Extremely easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Emmik

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are great. A few things -- One has to really POP the shelves out of place to disassemble. Even though the metal mesh is open, you really can't see book titles through it. Easy set up. Packaging it arrived in is not easy to transport -- and the box tore apart oddly. I found the instructions AFTER I put the whole thing together. With 2 units, I have all the shelves in a shoulder bag and then carry the frames under an arm (or stick it all in my wagon) Holds a LOT -- 2 6x9 books side by side per basket shelf.
customer_reviews.author: P. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great display for 11x14 matted prints
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for displaying my work vertically. I only wish there was one a little wider to display horizontally. Otherwise it displayed my matted prints 11x14 nicely. Easy to set up and pack.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: It was returned broken and sent to me broken.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited and ordered 2 because they were EXACTLY what I was looking for. One of them arrived broken at the top and missing a foot and the other arrived missing the 2 front “feet”. I honestly just wanted to get a replacement but apparently that was not an option so now I have to figure out how to mail these back...I would still love to order one to give it one more shot because they’re so adorable and perfect for my office waiting room but I don’t know if I should risk the chance. The boxes were damaged the parts were sticking out of the box...just bummed out
customer_reviews.author: Sarah DeMaison

customer_reviews.title: Simple design that I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was seeking a simple design for displaying some of my comics. I found this to be just the right fit for my goal. Added bonus of some storage space at its base so that I can stack the extra comics. I might get a second in the future to accommodate my further comics purchases...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great electronic storage and charging station
customer_reviews.text: Each member of my family has a pocket labeled with their name, and that's where their electronic devices (iPhones and iPads) rest while charging. It also allows my kids to have a central place to store their devices when they are not supposed to be using them. All the devices get parked here before bedtime and they are in plain sight.
customer_reviews.author: JillinHeels

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to use, perfect for my book display needs.
customer_reviews.text: As an author and editor, I need to display my books at a lot of events. This is the best book display I've ever used. I liked it so much that I've now ordered several more.
customer_reviews.author: Doczilla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Direct Sales Businesses!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful floor rack! I use it for my direct sales business and display some of my books and catalogs on it easily. The baskets each hold a fair amount of supplies and make it easy for people to view items and then replace them easily. The rack is lightweight, which is a must. The rack also breaks down (bottom and back piece sit flat). I am very satisfied with my purchase. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Smith

customer_reviews.title: Professional Display Rack
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and in excellent condition. It was well made and made my booth look very "upscale". Others who saw it, were quite impressed and asked where I got it. It was easy to assemble. I have purchased more!
customer_reviews.author: PKM

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do; hold magazines
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do; hold magazines. We use it at work and have at least three in each rack (some racks with more) and it holds them just fine. Very easy to assemble. Watch your foot on that bottom cross bar. Very easy to step on and the rod will bend.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: I love this display rack
customer_reviews.text: I love this display rack! Its large enough to hold several 11x17" prints in each pocket. It's lightweight and folds almost flat, which is perfect for taking with me to art shows. Looks great on the floor or on a table!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time or money on this!!!
customer_reviews.text: JUNK!!!! First the one I received was a crocked as a politician. I tried to straighten it out but could only do so much. It is total junk look for something else. This is not the rack you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: the finish is just as good as it was when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: We use this as an outdoor magazine rack for our real estate company. After two years of being outdoors, the finish is just as good as it was when it arrived. Very sturdy and when loaded down with magazines, pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: rrogalski78

customer_reviews.title: Works out good
customer_reviews.text: Got these for church and this works out good for our vestibule
customer_reviews.author: dywanne harris

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Magazine Rack!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the lobby area of our medium sized doctor's office. Exactly what I was looking for! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Angela R.

customer_reviews.title: It's a magazine rack...
customer_reviews.text: This magazine rack is great for holding a few magazines, however depending on the weight of the magazines, the support bars (some which were poorly welded) behind the baskets broke off. Other than that, super fast service! Great for quick and easy organization.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley M.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant look !
customer_reviews.text: Currently in use at an office and it looks really nice plus it does not need lots of space , it's not heavy metal so don't expect to be super steady and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We have a boss that does not like holes in the walls. This creates problems with my medical offices. This was a good solution to that problem. it looks nice, well constructed, durable, pretty and gets it done.
customer_reviews.author: Harry W. Brown, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my living room
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble and looks great. I bought this for my home because I fly alot so I always have a lot of magazines. Im so pleased with how this looks. I cant believe the price forn the fantastic look,design and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jihan Canino

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! It seems nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! It seems nice and sturdy, easy to put together and break down to fit easily into the car, and great for holding large, hardback children's storybooks for booth events.
customer_reviews.author: Christa E

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and functional.  Great organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Good functional equipment. Looks good in the office and helps keep magazines organized.
customer_reviews.author: med

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these in my office for all my insurance books and I very much like the look.
customer_reviews.author: PENNY COURTNEY

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME product
customer_reviews.text: I have books in one pocket, magazines in a pocket, handouts in a pocket ... very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: RDP

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of magazines.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hold my magazine collections so that I actually read the magazines I subscribe to instead of immediately losing them. It works well for that purpose. I’m thinking of getting another to use as a mail sorter.
customer_reviews.author: Ruti

customer_reviews.title: Very Please With the Product!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this stand to showcase magazines in our office. The quality is great and I am happy with the appearance. It would work better for a small amount of magazines, not marketing flyers/etc. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BAM

customer_reviews.title: Super Portable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transport. I only wish the baskets tilted back just a bit, as contents lean and then bend forward.
customer_reviews.author: susan ramie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap! This thing arrived bent and I needed it for a display show. Never used it. Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Ayo Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid the 3 pocket one wouldn’t be enough but it’s perfect for my magazines in the small bathroom! Super easy to assemble and holds a good amount of magazines! Plus I want to get a little table down the road and I could easily place this on top of the table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks good, good price, no problems at all
customer_reviews.text: for the price it's not bad at all... it was easy to assemble (not much work involved at all, very simple) and seems sturdy. i would purchase again and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cbc1973y

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase for me
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Sturdy and quick assembly. Wish I'd purchased years ago!
customer_reviews.author: R. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to display publications at a booth at a trade show and it's perfect. Breaks down nicely for storage in the box it ships in and it's light and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: StoicPlatypus

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our salon and I didn't realize how wonderful it would look in there but it looks amazing And it was so easy to put together. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Clari Linzmeier

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit flimsy, but I kind of expected that. I use it for my daughter's homeschool workbooks and it's holding up just fine, you just have to be careful if you move it around the room.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMater

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't figure out how to put the last shelf 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't figure out how to put the last shelf 3 of us tried it and one of the shelf came dented
customer_reviews.author: S. Kamal

customer_reviews.title: Minimal assembly upon arrival and looks nice in my room
customer_reviews.text: I use this to organize comic books I am currently reading but don't want left laying around where they could be damaged. This magazine rack has ample space for in each rack for multiple issues (14+) or 3 - 4 graphic novels. Minimal assembly upon arrival and looks nice in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Easy to set up and is very sturdy. I used to to display photographs for a show I did. It was very windy and didn't budge even once.
customer_reviews.author: Samara Sanger

customer_reviews.title: It was a perfect way to display the information
customer_reviews.text: We used this at a trade show to hold & separate informational flyers, brochures, and pamphlets. It was a perfect way to display the information.
customer_reviews.author: Jeano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for displaying magazines and other material outside our front door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our gym. Needed somewhere to put the mag. besides on the counter. Looks good and is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: dkd

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and display my materials. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Beseke

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy rack has defect
customer_reviews.text: Selected rack for appearance which would easily display the literature we collected while traveling through other countries and states. The mesh pockets are ideal for that. Only problem is that the rack is missing one of two bottom horizontal wires to hold the bottom 5th pocket in place. Had to use tie wraps for a fix.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and was already out together!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and looks like it cost a lot of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Spa's waiting room
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, perfect height magazine rack! I use it for my Spa's waiting room and it holds lots of magazines and is a great size. I highly recommend it for anyone who is in need of a place to display magazines. Thank you! [...]
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi K Hale

customer_reviews.title: magazine rack
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It looks so nice and my magazines are all organized now, like a doctor's office.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Morales

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a display rack on a table. I can fit two sets of 6" x 9" magazines in each slot.
customer_reviews.author: Wizzy

customer_reviews.title: Looks & works great. Two months later & I think I should ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my office. Looks & works great. Two months later & I think I should have gotten something larger to hold more magazines.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba40

customer_reviews.title: ... these at our company trade shows and they work great. Plus you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Used these at our company trade shows and they work great. Plus you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: IslandLvr

customer_reviews.title: Great rack, poor assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Good magazine rack for sheet music and song books. Dumbest assembly instructions I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kipp M. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly even with NO instructions. Took less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very nice I was able to take to a local coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice I was able to take to a local coffee shop and disply my pic's the same day it came in!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bozarth

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses it for his business. Came fast and easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: MN86YEA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easier to see my magazines when displayed this way. Cleaner reception area due to less clutter!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, light duty rack.
customer_reviews.text: This rack is light and functional. It does not twist or bend. A perfect addition to my office waiting area.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: NICE RACKS
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Affordable -Looks classy -Can hold 4-8 magazines on a row on average Cons: -The pockets could be thicker. -It doesn't hold a lot of magazines. So make sure you only keep the recent ones on the rack . Overall I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nico L.

customer_reviews.title: nice rack for literature
customer_reviews.text: nice, lightweight, simple literature rack. easy to assemble, easy to move. not big or bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Ritas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have this floor rack at my shop and saved me a lot space.
customer_reviews.author: Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Candy holder
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfect to hold candy for our theater room.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!!! Don't even have to put it together!!!
customer_reviews.author: BD, Va

customer_reviews.title: Economical
customer_reviews.text: Needed a rack that wouldn't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: But I find magazines tend to curl in this and not stay flat. That's because the compartments are oddly shaped.
customer_reviews.author: shoplikeaboss

customer_reviews.title: perfect.. as described
customer_reviews.text: perfect..as described...super easy to put together..arrived quickly, would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: candy lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for work and it fits my needs perfectly. Very happy with deliver and product.
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaR

customer_reviews.title: It was packed very well and super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We received the magazine rack before the due date. It was packed very well and super easy to put together. I ordered it for the front office and have gotten rave reviews.
customer_reviews.author: KRTV C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Businesses and both came well built and I have customers asking where we got them!
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in the office; whereas magazines were in a pile on a table, before, now they are more visible and look more organized. Not extremely sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Looks very professional at a good price. Looks good in my office and also at trade shows.
customer_reviews.author: T. deakin

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It helps me organize my magazines and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It helps me organize my magazines and they aren't cluttered up all over my kitchen island.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this magazine e rack has worked great for my salon, saves space and keeps my magazines organized

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The floor rack was delivered on time,. and was exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kym Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Magazine display
customer_reviews.text: Once I realized how to set the baskets in the correct way to keep them from swinging out and dumping my magazines on the floor.. I was completely satisfied! Take the time to set it up correctly the first time.. unlike me.. and you'll be completely happy with this purchase. Serves the purpose I bought it for. Very happy with the magazine rack.. holder.. display.. etc
customer_reviews.author: kelley

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: it can fit so many more magazine then I thought...love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not only was I completely satisfied but others were impressed by quality for money.

customer_reviews.title: very nice looking easy to snap together
customer_reviews.text: very nice looking easy to snap together. It was not wide enough for the space I put it so I ordered another and put them side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. Fit the space we have available. I did think it would be a little taller though.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stand and space saver. Ordering a few more soon.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, quite sturdy and perfect for my needs. It appears to be quite portable for trade shows as well. I am very pleased with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very sturdy and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very sturdy and functional. Exactly what we needed for displaying magazines.

product_meta.title: Safco Products Onyx Floor Literature Organizer Rack, 5 Pocket, 6461BL, Black Powder Coat Finish, Durable Steel Mesh Construction, Space-saving Functionality
product_meta.description: Size:5 PocketOnyx Floor Literature Organizer Rack, 5 Pocket displays magazines, catalogs and other publications in a unique, eye-catching, ladder-style design. Each pocket holds 1 1/4" of printed materials. Durable, powder coat finish on the commercial-grade steel frame helps resist chipping and scratching for long-lasting use. Steel mesh pockets promote air flow to help reduce dust buildup for easy maintenance. Ideal for use in private offices, collaborative spaces, hospitality areas, lobbies, libraries, classrooms—anyplace that could benefit from stylish, space-saving organization. The Onyx Family includes a diverse collection of stylishly-designed steel mesh products, from desktop organizers to machine stands. Onyx makes it easy to create a sleek, professional, organized workspace.
feature_bullets: FLOOR DISPLAY. Onyx Floor Literature Organizer Rack, 5 Pocket displays magazines, catalogs and other publications in a unique, eye-catching, ladder-style design. Each pocket holds 1 1/4" of printed materials.
LONG-LASTING QUALITY. Durable, powder coat finish on the commercial-grade steel frame helps resist chipping or scratching while the steel mesh design promotes air flow to reduce dust buildup.
PRODUCT DIMENSIONS. Organizer rack measures 12 1/2"W x 18 1/2"D x 46"H. Weight: 10.3 lbs.
APPLICATIONS. Ideal for use in private offices, collaborative spaces, hospitality areas, lobbies, libraries, classrooms—anyplace that could benefit from stylish, space-saving organization.

GREENGUARD Certified products are scientifically proven to meet some of the world’s most rigorous, third-party chemical emissions standards—helping reduce indoor air pollution and the risk of chemical exposure to help create healthier indoor environments.
